Hi!
I read from the documentation that failed assumptions should be reporte=
d as ignored test cases but when I'm trying to use them my test cases are p=
assed though failed assumptions.

In what way should they behave?
In junit =
code it's stated as they should pass which I think is incorrect.
See Result=
.java:testAssumptionFailure.

Could anyone clarify on this please.
/Stefan
=

additional note, I've read some posts that assumptions work
in my expected=
 way when used in beforeclass. But all doc says
that it should be usable on=
 individual test cases too.
